content: this corner bookmark is a great quick crochet project for the book lover in your life start at the center and grow the triangle until it is as large as needed for the book you are reading customizable and easily memorized materials animation yarn 1 -less than one skein per bookmark crochet hook in size 3mm 1 https //www awin1 com/cread php awinmid=89047&awinaffid=1976179&ued=https%3a%2f%2fwww crochet com%2fyarn%2fanimation%2fc%2f5420497
